website_summaries.verdict: A booster that can be used with both a latch system and the vehicle seat belt. Can be used with or without the back.
pros: Unique front tether adjustment for latch system makes it easy to get a good fit
Cup holder and hideaway storage container let your child keep a few extras in the car
Can be used for children weighing up to 60 lbs
cons: Headrest position can be problematic in vehicles of a certain make and model

customer_reviews.title: 6 year old survived 3-roll accident without a scratch
customer_reviews.text: We just replaced the last car seat like this we had after being in a accident. Our car flipped three times on the highway and my son emerged without a scratch. As soon as we were safe at home I cam here to order the same seat again because I was so impressed with how well it kept him safe. It's also very easy to install and not too wide. Wish we hadn't had the opportunity to test it out in such awful circumstances, but now will tell everyone we know how grateful we are to this car seat.
customer_reviews.author: TelepLikeItIs

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous do not buy
customer_reviews.text: This booster seat has a major defect that another reviewer commented on and I ignored... the back head rest slowly lowers by itself while you are driving and your child is sitting in the seat. It does not lock into place properly. It makes the seat belt lay too low, out of proper alignment. I discovered this too late to return it. Graco has a number of hoops to jump through to repair it. Very annoying and dangerous. My son was using it at the lowest height and it wasn’t until he grew taller that I’ve discovered the issue.
customer_reviews.author: L.S.

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT! It Latches so it won’t move around.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. The reason i bought this one is because it can latch to the back seat and won’t move. I first purchased an even flow brand high-back booster and it felt cheaply made and the fact that it would not latch into the car is just ridiculous in my opinion. Anytime I would make a turn while driving, the seat would tilt my son to the left or to the right. How can that possibly be safe? It’s super easy to latch, and with the push of a button it’s just as easy to unlatch it and move into another car. I highly recommend this high back booster.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer

customer_reviews.title: OK. Has Latch system.
customer_reviews.text: It's OK. I don't like the seat belt hoop on the shoulders. The belt always gets twisted due to the design. I feel it doesn't strap in as tightly as I would want it. It's better than most because it does have a latch system so you don't have to worry about the seat sliding off the car seat. It just seems a bit flimsy to me but I'm comparing it to the Recaro car seat I had in there prior which seemed like it was bolted to the car. The back is adjustable so it can fit kids that are taller to protect their heads.
customer_reviews.author: kidd3791

customer_reviews.title: lightweight and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: We flew with two of these (in bags for checking in) a few times. Very light weight and easy to install/transfer. We've also made several roadtrip with them and kids seem comfortable. BUT, there is no head support so whenever they fall asleep their heads bob loosely. I think its something to do with the seat back. Its pretty upright (not leaning back like baby seats) so gravity takes over. After the first two roadtrip we started bringing pillows / large teddys so we can prop them up if need be.
customer_reviews.author: Kers

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this booster! I just recently decided my newly turned 6 year old was ready for a booster. I am not fond of booster for the fact that they dont lock in place! This one however has an anchor system and converts from a high back booster to a regular booster. I love these features. My daughter also said it is comfortable. It has a sleek clean look and doesnt take up any leg room from the front passengers. I will definitely buy this again when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Love this booster
customer_reviews.text: Love this booster. I love the fabric. Easily cleaned because it's not too porous. Anchor system could be easier. It's a struggle at times. Its not the newer latch system with the push button it's the traditional anchors buy the important thing is that is HAS a latch system to keep the bottom seat from moving. I recommend putting the anchors in sideways to start to latch easier and turned sideways after releasing for an easier pull out. Make sure you sit on the car seat and pull the straps to tighten one at a time in order to keep it from being too loose or coming loose.
customer_reviews.author: nicole smith

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I got this booster after I had ordered another brand and set it back. This seat is comparable to other more expensive versions. I take car seats very seriously since my child's safety is involved. He's on the small side for his age so we've been limited to what products we can use. The padding on this is very good and he says it's comfortable. I specifically ordered the version with the LATCH system for added safety. The release for the LATCH system is on the front so it's very easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: MHM

customer_reviews.title: Great seat- love the latch system!
customer_reviews.text: Love this booster seat! We'd originally purchased the Affix without latch and returned it immediately as when installed in the car it moved all over the place and didn't seem safe at all. I know the latch system isn't supposed protect the child anymore but it more to secure the car seat itself, but it is so much more secure feeling with the latch system. Now when my child climbs into the seat, it doesn't move more than about an inch to the side whereas before you could literally move it about six inches. My child says it's comfortable and likes that they can unbuckle themselves. Spend the extra money to get the latch system!
customer_reviews.author: AEW

customer_reviews.title: Tired of moving heavy bulky seats around? Give this one a try for sure.
customer_reviews.text: So if your like me trying to find an easier alternative to keeping the kids safe while not having to strain while moving a seat from car to car? Well this is it! Simple to install, stays in place due to the integrated retaining straps and best of all its light and portable. Why the 4 stars then? Well the seat covering could have been better executed, my son is unable to pull the storage tray in and out unless we pull the cover to the point where it feels like it will tear. Otherwise besides the basic blown plastic construction, it works as it should.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price and seem to be rather safe.
customer_reviews.text: We now have a total of 3 of these for my 6 yr old. One for each car. I would prefer have preferred Recaro (since they make real racing seats) but have pulled out of the US market after some tests showed they failed catastrophically when tested beyond capacity. So Graco it is, and they aren't bad. I like the Latch straps to help keep it in its spot when not belted in... the only one that I know of.
customer_reviews.author: RomanS

customer_reviews.title: Great high back latch booster
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a booster with latch. Being an ER nurse just made me feel like the seat would be more secure. It is super easy to install just use latch clips then pull tighting strap in front. Is a narrow seat so doesn't take up a lot of room and makes it easy for my son to buckle himself in. Cup holder is perfect and easy to adjust headrest. Plus becomes just a booster seat. Perfect. He looks comfortable and secure. Will buy for my daughter when old enough
customer_reviews.author: T. Gorsuch

customer_reviews.title: good seat, good price
customer_reviews.text: I tend to always buy Graco products and am never disappointed. My daughter is 5 and this is her first non-harness seat, she loves the colors and I like how this seat still buckles/connects to the captain's seat in my van. I also like that I can use the full size back of the seat and that it comes apart when she's ready for the bottom booster only. Seat seems comfy and is easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Love love love it
customer_reviews.text: My 4yo son is about 42 inches tall now so we’ve had to upgrade his car seat. I wanted something with anchors, check, that was easy to install, check, and easy to get him in and out of without hitting his head, and check. Could not be happier. Excellent price, simple assembly and install. and it should last us a very long time. The first time I ordered it someone stole it off our porch, but amazing Amazon sent us a replacement immediately. Best. Service. Ever.
customer_reviews.author: kkTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Grab One!
customer_reviews.text: They are a breeze to assemble right out of the box. The seats are lightweight and easy to use in the vehicle. They are fun for the kids as they have a cup holder and a secret compartment that slides out. They can be be moved from my truck to my wife's van without much hassle. They are hands down the best seats we've used for our kids. They take up a lot less room than the infant and toddler seats we had to use before when the kids were little. I think they will be a breeze to wash when necessary but can't say yet. If you're on the fence about these hoop off and buy them!
customer_reviews.author: OnlineGuru31

customer_reviews.title: Cup holder is underneath seat
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this product! I read many reviews about this booster seat. Some of the reviews had pictures of what appeared to be missing the cup holders. THE CUP HOLDER IS UNDERNEATH THE SEAT. you have to find it then put it in. Didn't like that part but no big deal. The only other thing that is questionable is the middle sections material is held on by a tiny little hook not sure if the hook will last but I hope so and if not it could be easily fixed with new hook sewn on. Overall great product very happy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Elaine carson

customer_reviews.title: He’s happy, I’m happy and there’s a cup holder!
customer_reviews.text: I love the latches. The seat holds still while the kid climbs in and out. He can see and not too limited movement wise. The seatbelt sits just right. The ability to recline the seat made it fit just right.
customer_reviews.author: ReaderTeacherPetLover

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, safe, and comfortable-great value!
customer_reviews.text: This seat is a great transition from a 3-way car seat to a booster! It's easy to install, convenient because it latches to the seat (no need to buckle it in even when a child isn't sitting it in), and priced right. We've used it for about 6 months now with our almost-5-year-old son, including a very long road trip. He said it is comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: J. Maclauchlan

customer_reviews.title: Love this and so does the kiddo
customer_reviews.text: My son is now 7 and he still uses this.. sure he doesnt technically need to use a seat but I am not telling him that. I believe he is much safer in this with the head protection aspect of it. easy to install and I was even able to color match it to my truck practically!
customer_reviews.author: E-Money

customer_reviews.title: worked great in accident
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, this car seat was put to the test when I had a car accident over a week ago. My car flipped over and I was so worried since he was just being held in by a seat belt and he is tall, but not super heavy. Needless to say, he was perfectly secure and safe in this seat! and not one scratch! I purchased another one to purchase the old one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hard to buckle
customer_reviews.text: Decent car seat, easily installed. Haven’t had an accident so I can’t speak to how well it would do it’s actually job, however, it’s a pain to buckle, it’s about 1/2” too wide for my cars seat so it puts the buckle in a hard to reach area. My son cannot buckle himself so every time I have to half climb into my car to reach over him and fight with his buckle.
customer_reviews.author: S.Miles

customer_reviews.title: Love this seat
customer_reviews.text: Love this seat. Already tested for a 3 hr + car ride and was way better experience for our 4 year old than the previous convertible car seat. It reclines just enough for extra comfort. Light, super easy to install, perfect system to keep the seat belt perfectly aligned and comfortable for our kid. Highly recommend and very glad we made the switch as we have reduced car sickness and increased backseat space. Our kid loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Jack of All Trades

customer_reviews.title: I prefer my Nautilus for safety's sake
customer_reviews.text: I needed a second car seat for my seven year old son, his other seat is a Graco Nautilus Elite which he's had since he was about two and a half. When we got this one it seemed pretty flimsy in comparison, but I guess it's my fault for not realizing it doesn't have the steel bars supporting the back of the seat. My son prefers this seat because he likes that it reclines more than the Nautilus, the orange fabric and the slide out snack tray, but for safety's sake I definitely prefer the Nautilus. It's a decent seat, but I'm not completely sold on it for safety and isn't that the most important thing.
customer_reviews.author: Kendylou

customer_reviews.title: Awesome price and great booster
customer_reviews.text: Awesome price and great booster. Purchased this one for my son as my daughter has had the exact model in a different color. Works great and the latch system is an added bonus. I have read all the reviews that said the latch system is not need however I feel that my children are more secure with the latch system on their boosters.
customer_reviews.author: Kim T

customer_reviews.title: I think this is great. My son is very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: For the price, I think this is great. My son is very happy with it. Britax seats are definitely more padded, but they're also 3 times the price so I don't know if it's just to compare that. I much prefer the armrests on thee Graco Highback Turbobooster that we got for his sister though; they arc down and make using the seatbelt with the armrests much easier. I wish I would have gotten that model instead of this one, but had I not had them side by side to compare then I would be quite happy with this seat.
customer_reviews.author: burkypants

customer_reviews.title: Fits nice in a sedan
customer_reviews.text: One grievance—the shoulder belt slips out of the little holder sometimes, especially when the 6 yr old sitting in the seat is messing around with the shoulder belt. Other than that this seat is nice and compact. Not overwhelming in a Honda!
customer_reviews.author: bluebird

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves it and I love that it uses latch system
customer_reviews.text: My daughter had outgrown her carseat a while ago and was resisting getting into it. I was holding off because I didn't want to just rely on seatbelt. She likes it a lot and it doesn't slide around due to having attachments for latch system.. Also happy with bottle holder and snack try - though snack try is hard to pull out. All in all, very pleased with it and bought a second one for our other car.
customer_reviews.author: Siobhan McKenna

customer_reviews.title: Great product all around.
customer_reviews.text: Comfy enough for long trips. Sturdy enough that I feel safe putting my son in it. Light enough that I can easily move it from car to car without issues. Just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of Boys

customer_reviews.title: Quality booster that stops the head flopping
customer_reviews.text: This is very well made. My preschooler frequently falls asleep on long car trips and this boosted keeps his head from flopping. Some reviewers complained of this seat not remaining anchored tightly, but I've had this for a few months and haven't had any problems with it becoming loose or sliding. It is securely installed. My child loves the fun orange color and the cup/snack/toy holders. He loves to put a toy car in one of the holders.
customer_reviews.author: Frieda

customer_reviews.title: Nice booster. Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Nice booster. Easy to put together. LOVE that it has a latch system, which was important to me when buying a booster. Only thing I dont like is that it kind of "shakes" when driving and there is no kid in it and it's noisy. Sounds odd, I know - but its true! I now have 3 of these, 2 for each vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Jones

customer_reviews.title: Good booster for price.  Latch
customer_reviews.text: This is an okay booster. It seems flimsy at first when connecting the two pieces but once it is attached it is good. I like the latch to keep it stable. Good value for the price. I don't like it as well as our 5 point harness Britax booster but it was a fraction of the price so it is the one I shipped ahead for vacation.
customer_reviews.author: LVATTY

customer_reviews.title: perfect!
customer_reviews.text: this thing takes 2 seconds to install and fits very snugly to the seat without any movement! the cup holder is in perfect distance. it washes very easily! we are very satisfied with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Great seats!
customer_reviews.text: Great booster seat! We had Evenflo Maestro seats before and when we went to swap them over to booster seats, they just didn't work well with the seltbelts in my 2016 Honda Odyssey. These work perfectly! Not too bulky and love how they use the LATCH system to keep them in place, especially when not in use!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Goodwin

customer_reviews.title: This booster with latch system has got in on lock. . .
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is so proud to be able to buckle herself and I am proud that we made the decision to purchase this particular booster. What I love about this product is that it is so easy to install and adjust to meet your needs. I greatly appreciate the fact that this seat unlike many other boosters still uses the latch system, allowing for securing of the seat even when not in use. We have always purchased Safety First seats in the past, but this seat seemed like a great fit for our needs and it met all our own expectations and made our child happy as well.
customer_reviews.author: dieder

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but leans to one side
customer_reviews.text: We like this car seat but it doesn’t perfect in our Jeep Cherokee. We prefer to put our son in the middle of the back seat instead of one of the sides, so it may fit better on the sides. It leans a little bit to one side in the middle and it’s a learning curve for our son to buckle it himself.
customer_reviews.author: Browns

customer_reviews.title: Great price, and works well.
customer_reviews.text: My kid *loved* the color (he like orange). I was looking for two boosters I could put in the back of my wife's sedan with an infant car seat, and was able to make this work (when I took out the cup holders and the arm rests). It was tight but it worked. It was easy to latch in, and the mechanism seems to work well.
customer_reviews.author: Harry Marlin

customer_reviews.title: So happy!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Son loves the color. Easy to install. I LOVE the anchor tightening straps on the front, it's SO much easier than traditional anchor systems. And the cup holder is the perfect size. The snack tray thing is a little goofy as it's so tiny, and hard to pull out for my son, but I don't care whether he has that space or not, so I still LOVE this booster.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Beirdneau

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My 5 yrs old loved it! It was super easy to assemble and install. My son said it was super cool and comfortable. I bought this one because it has the LATCH system for when the booster is not being used. The color is really vibrant and the fabric soft. I think the price was fair for what we got! ** He was very excited about the cupholder and the little drawer underneath.
customer_reviews.author: Ivelisse Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Only thing I don't like is that the seat belt slips out of the guides on the side of these seats when draping over the shoulder. I have to figure out a way to hold them in place and stop them from coming out and twisting up.
customer_reviews.author: 5starchick

customer_reviews.title: The head part does not stay up
customer_reviews.text: I had to tie the headreast part up when my son grew taller because it would not stay up. Its supposed to adjust and it just keeps slipping back down in the lowest position. Of course it took about 8 months for me to know this.
customer_reviews.author: sam

customer_reviews.title: Good seat, but headrest doesn't help hold head up
customer_reviews.text: This is a good booster seat after the child car seat. I am using it for my 5 year old who is 44" tall and about 41 lbs. The only challenge is that I thought the headrest would held with holding his head up when he falls asleep like his car seat did. But when he falls asleep, his head is almost in his lap. I had to purchase an extra pillow that straps on to the seatbelt to help keep his head up and allow him to rest on it.
customer_reviews.author: Dsquared

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Great seat. Really light weight. Easy to place inside the car. Love the fact that it has the locking latch is like a regular car seat
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Safe & sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Got this car seat after doing some research and it is great. Our 4 yo is in the 99th percentile on height but this seat fits him perfectly and safety. I was able to put this together and install it in 15-20. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Mouille

customer_reviews.title: You won’t be disappointed. Great safe seat!
customer_reviews.text: So glad I purchased this seat. We bought “tangerine” and it’s a true orange. The seat has clips that clip into the metal parts of your seat. So much safer than most booster seats. Would recommend to all!
customer_reviews.author: M.Friske

customer_reviews.title: Perfect booster!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought three of these seats for our cars and the grandparents. I live the latch system it just makes me feel safer knowing the seat can't move. It's easy to install and out together and it's comfortable. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie kiser

customer_reviews.title: Safe and easy!
customer_reviews.text: Love that it has LATCH so that you don't have to remember to put the seatbelt back on when nobody is sitting in it. I think it also makes it easier for the kid to put it on properly since it's not moving around. Very easy to assemble and install.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin M.

customer_reviews.title: Good booster
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research because I was/am apprehensive about switching to a booster. This seems to be a great one and no complaints after 6 months of use
customer_reviews.author: Starla Hedrick

customer_reviews.title: After much review, we purchased 3 of these seats
customer_reviews.text: We ordered 3 of these seats and we're very happy with them. They are super easy to assemble, very comfortable for my 4yr old to sit in and easy to install into the car. The latch system keeps the seat in place when my child is not riding in our cars. Amazon had competitive pricing to all big box retailers (especially in regard to choice of color) and I know with Amazon if I have any trouble with an item, they'll take it back and refund my money.
customer_reviews.author: RocMomma

customer_reviews.title: I loved this seat but sadly had to return it
customer_reviews.text: I loved this seat but sadly had to return it. Myself nor the carseat techs could not get a popper install in my Jeep Commander. according to the manual the booster has to be against the back of the car's seat. The car's headrest would not allow this. We tried it all; reclining seat, folding head restraint forward, taking the the head cushion off only left the rods exposed (the rods that hold restrain do not come out) folding rods forward, putting cushion backwards, nothing worked.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Perfect big boy seat
customer_reviews.text: Great affordable Booster seat. My son says its comfortable, it was easy to install, and it seems like it is easy to clean. All important factors!
customer_reviews.author: Cassie Jo

customer_reviews.title: Love this seat!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install. well designed to hold the seat belt. Has a cup holder. Good colors. Seat is tightly installed and doesn't move much once installed.
customer_reviews.author: Sulu

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased - can't go wrong with Graco!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my five year old. Easy to attach (latch feature is nice) and move around from car to car. Great color, comfortable and the compartments for water and snacks are a must! Good purchase!
customer_reviews.author: riirca37

customer_reviews.title: Graco Youth Booster, you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, as nice as this product looks, I was not impressed after arrival. Somewhat cheap material, was not thrilled with it, so returned. Bought the Chicco seat instead I saw in Target but less expensive on Amazon...as usual :-)
customer_reviews.author: LMH in Atlanta

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value!
customer_reviews.text: We have been extremely pleased with this purchase. We love the cost effectiveness of this high back booster seat that still attaches to the car seat latches. The head rest isn't too big like it is on some other Graco models. It's very comfortable for our son as well. It was also very easy to assemble. We're very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: EP

customer_reviews.title: you'll probably like it, i dunno
customer_reviews.text: it's pretty good. I don't have any basis for comparison. The one thing i don't like is when i pick it up from the top, if i don't hold the seat, the seat falls off b/c it's not fastened or clipped on really, it's just kinda fits together. Not a big deal, but i would think they could just put a freaking strap down there to hold it together when i'm moving it in and out of the car
customer_reviews.author: Heisenberg

customer_reviews.title: Great price for quality!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great seat for the price. Our four year old loves it. I love that it has an easy latch system to use and the cup holder and storage drawer is very convenient. The only thing I did not like about the product was how the bottom and back snap together. The first time we used it was for a vacation to Florida where we flew. The back snaps off very easily and when we went to pick up our luggage it was in two pieces. I would recommend buying a bag to put the seat in for travel purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Kourtk326

customer_reviews.title: Follow the instructions!
customer_reviews.text: Great color, snap fit assembly, AND grand son liked this one better than the families, PLUS easy lock down AND release.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Shoulder strap doesn’t stay in headrest loop.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 of these seats for my twin six year olds. I like everything about the seats except the shoulder strap ALWAYS comes out of the loop on the headrest, which then makes the safety of this seat much lower. I would love to return these seats, but I threw all the packaging away.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael Clavette

customer_reviews.title: Good price and great product
customer_reviews.text: I like that this seat has the latch system..it definitely makes me feel a little more at ease about transitioning my 4 year old to a regular seat belt. I am very happy with this purchase so far and so is my son. Also, he likes the orange color!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves her new big girl seat.
customer_reviews.text: Came as described. Selected the orange and the color is true to image. Look under the chair for the cup holder. Our daughter is so happy that she's upgraded to the big girl chair.
customer_reviews.author: Donw

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and our daughter loved it! She was comfortable for a 23 hour drive.
customer_reviews.author: Mike and Evey

customer_reviews.title: Latching Booster
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a booster seat for my kiddo that latched into the seat since untethered items become projectiles in a collision. This booster has all the pros of the standard Graco booster seat with the bonus of a super easy Latch system. It installs in just a few minutes and then is ready to go. It is also very light weight and easy to switch between cars.
customer_reviews.author: Mokie'sMama

customer_reviews.title: Great functional booster seat!
customer_reviews.text: Great booster seat for our 4 year old just out of his five point harness. He is tall and I enjoy the adjustable headrest, the latch system, the cup holder and the hidden compartment. My son loves the comfort of it and that he can buckle himself in. Also the sides of the headrest curve out enough to allow him to take naps without his head falling to the side.
customer_reviews.author: M. M. VanderWal

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to hook in and out as well as loosen ...
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to hook in and out as well as loosen and tighten the straps. Convenient hooks for seat belt adjustment. Love that the back can be taken off when child gets a little older or if traveling and there isn't room to take the whole car seat (bottom and back rest). I've seen some comments say that only one of the hook straps will tighten and the other slides, I think they have difficulty with the "teeth" grabbing and tightening each individual strap - I have had two of these car seats for over a year and have not had that problem with either one.
customer_reviews.author: MImommy

customer_reviews.title: Not fully satisfied with how it’s build for safety.
customer_reviews.text: It looks good, but it’s doesn’t feel that safe at all. Will never purchase from this company again another booster seat for my other child. Will look for something safer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great seat
customer_reviews.text: I like this seat a lot. It holds a drink and snacks. It tethers to the car so it doesn't wiggle on my kid trying to buckle himself in. The seatbelt thread works really well and it hasn't gotten the belt turned around. The seat is made fully out of plastic but it isn't super flimsy. We tried some other booster seats and they too were made entirely from plastic but they were really cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Spark

customer_reviews.title: Uses LATCH
customer_reviews.text: The children are comfortable and I feel these are safer than most booster seats. I love they use the LATCH system so they’re not getting kicked around or out of place when the kids get in and out of the car.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: THE CUP HOLDER IS UNDER THE BASE ITS NOT MISSING
customer_reviews.text: Was going to buy a $250 booster because I thought it was the best of the best. I read the iihs safety reviews and this did just as good as the crazy expensive ones. It took 5 minutes to snap together and mount in car. Daughter loves it very roomy.
customer_reviews.author: Sgt M

customer_reviews.title: Cup holder and cubby are useful as well
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight. Soft material. Head rest is enough to help support a sleeping head. Cup holder and cubby are useful as well. Good choice for a highback booster. Plan to purchase another for the next kid when the time comes.
customer_reviews.author: kevin barrett

customer_reviews.title: Great seat!
customer_reviews.text: My almost 5 year old loves his new seat! It was so easy to install and takes up much less room than his old convertible seat. He feels like such a big boy now, and I still feel like he is safe in this booster.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Feltner

customer_reviews.title: Safer Option
customer_reviews.text: Wanted booster with extra protection and tether to attach to the car. This one is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: E.Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: Perfect. We got one for nana and the grandkids fight over it.
customer_reviews.text: What a great seat. Feels good and looks good. Stays put in the seat. Comfortable (the kids fight over who gets to sit in this one) I am not a fan of loose items in the vehicle - that will fly around the vehicle and hit you in the back of the head in the event you are in an accident, and this will not fly out of the seat. Need to buy another one now.
customer_reviews.author: Signilicrad

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install - good color option.
customer_reviews.text: LOVE it...looks great with tan/ brown leather interior. Daughter loves it as well - the cup holder is the right size and easy to install - but feels secure. This is our 2nd one of this model - different color - perfect!
customer_reviews.author: DANA C.

customer_reviews.title: Moving up
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this seat. The storage bin can be a little tough to open and close but otherwise this is great. The back can come off but we're using as is in the middle back seat. It's pretty comfy for him and has a thingy that holds the seat belt too. Great seat for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Joan Favret

customer_reviews.title: Great Car Seat!
customer_reviews.text: We have 2 tried and and true Graco true Affix Backless Youth Booster Car Seats. With these seats you simply attach to anchors and pull straps from front and the seat is extremely secure. Moreover, the kids are cofortable in these seats. Safe and secure!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Quality product.
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Bought for our granddaughter’s visits based on our daughter-in-law’s recommendation as they have one.
customer_reviews.author: ronald j. hax

customer_reviews.title: Booster with LATCH system
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a booster with storage compartments and the LATCH system (which most boosters do not have). This seat perfectly fit the bill and meets high safety standards. It's so much easier for my kids to get in and out of the car. And because of the LATCH tethers, the seat does not shift with my kids getting in and out of the car.
customer_reviews.author: Flashpoint

customer_reviews.title: Quaity Graco product
customer_reviews.text: These are nice. We had their structured car seats and now that the Grandson is getting bigger, the booster gives him the leg room and options to ease out of the kid seat eventually. Shipped quick and priced about right.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonPurchases

customer_reviews.title: My kid outgrew the child seat pretty fast. So we had to order the booster ...
customer_reviews.text: My kid outgrew the child seat pretty fast. So we had to order the booster car seat. Easy assembly and install in the car. In fact it is very easy to remove it from one car to the other...
customer_reviews.author: Amit Ashara

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice lightweight carseat. It's easy to move it around and I like the anchor hooks on the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: Love that they hook into the car
customer_reviews.text: Many others dont attach to the seat, this one does and I appreciate the height options as I have a tall child.
customer_reviews.author: Dony

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 3 & 1/2 year old. He loves it! It was easy to install and I love the latch system. It is so easy I wish all carseat made their latch system that way!!
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't take up much space, but still allows for side head protection and cushioned comfort.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't take up much space, but still allows for side head protection and cushioned comfort. This was the most appropriate car seat I could find to place in cab side facing truck seats.
customer_reviews.author: Miss ReadTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: We love it.
customer_reviews.text: My family loves this chair. Just what we were looking for in comfort safety and ease of installation
customer_reviews.author: Charles E.

customer_reviews.title: My child loves this carseat because it's comfortable. I love it because it anchors to the ...
customer_reviews.text: My child loves this carseat because it's comfortable. I love it because it anchors to the car it makes it much more stable than other high-back boosters. The only reason I didn't get it 5 stars is because I never figured out how to get the cup holder attached. The directions are not fabulous.
customer_reviews.author: nicknack

customer_reviews.title: Safe, secure, and budget friendly
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this car seat and the price was budget friendly. We have not tested this for a long trip, but my son hasn't made any complaints about discomfort. My second son has asked me to get him one, which I will, when he gets to the appropriate age.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put in car, comfortable and good fit
customer_reviews.text: Loved the color.... grandson asked for an orange seat for the car and Amazon delivered. Easy to put in car, comfortable and good fit.
customer_reviews.author: Michael L.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I needed this for my 4 year old. I love that it fits lower on the seat and it’s roomy for him. We left the back on because he still falls asleep in the car sometimes. But this is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Bookworm

customer_reviews.title: Light and so easy to add and remove from a car
customer_reviews.text: Love it. It is so much easier to get in and out of the car. Very light yet durable. Don't forget the cup holder is under the seat when you set it up.
customer_reviews.author: mafitzinger

customer_reviews.title: would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my niece, when she comes to visit as she has outgrown her hand me down car seat. I got a less expensive colour :) was fairly easy to assemble and install. I liked the extra secure hooks too.
customer_reviews.author: Trotter12123

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Son loves it, I love it, easy to put in the car. I have a Chevy cruz
customer_reviews.author: Momsalot

customer_reviews.title: Booster seat attaches to the rear seat.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable for my child and good value for the money. This unit also has straps to secure the seat to your car seat latches. Any other units do not.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly simple
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described, comfortable and easy to install, and child loves the seat. Great range of colors for a unique look. We went with the orange and grey. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: British Paul

customer_reviews.title: Great booster seat
customer_reviews.text: I really like this booster seat. It was really easy to put together and really easy to install. My five year old loves it.
customer_reviews.author: RDW

customer_reviews.title: Great Seat
customer_reviews.text: This booster is amazing. I bought it because we are driving across country and wanted something comfortable for my son to sit in for like 10 hours straight. It perfectly supports his neck when he naps and it reclines as well.
customer_reviews.author: Denia Napoli

customer_reviews.title: I like the fact that it can grow with them and ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time getting this car seat...I have one for my older grandson and when my second grandson made the requirements in height and weight I didn't hesitate to order another. I like the fact that it can grow with them and that it latches into the car.
customer_reviews.author: christine Rasmussen

customer_reviews.title: Also looks great and has a cup holder
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, slim, and cheap! Also looks great and has a cup holder. I've researched booster seats ranging from Graco to Clek and I have to say that this is the best bang for the buck.
customer_reviews.author: Erik Antonio

customer_reviews.title: It is an easy seat to get into
customer_reviews.text: We needed an extra car seat for our four year old who had outgrown his "baby" carseat but I just wasn't ready to transition to booster. It is an easy seat to get into, its not bulky, its comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Steve McMoy

customer_reviews.title: Cheap.
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t like this car seat at all. Very cheaply made, doesn’t feel safe. I am so disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: It works just fine. You must pull each strap separately
customer_reviews.text: About the LATCH system. It works just fine. You must pull each strap separately, but it holds the seat securely in place. Also, I am using it in the back seat of a new Mustang. I had a Britax (which fit very snug), but the dimensions on their booster would not work. The Graco fits perfectly in the small space. This one is also good if you have a preschooler who does not quite weigh 40 pounds.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Zachary

product_meta.title: Graco Affix Highback Booster Seat with Latch System, Tangerine
product_meta.description: The Graco Affix Highback Booster Seat with Latch System helps safely transport your big kid from 40 to 100 lb* and up to 57" tall. It provides a secure connection to your vehicle seat with its one-hand front-adjust Latch system, making self-buckling easier for your independent child. While the purpose of the Latch** in the Affix Booster is to secure the booster to the vehicle seat while the booster is unoccupied and help facilitate independent buckling, you will secure your child in the booster seat with the vehicle lap/shoulder belt. The seat has an integrated cup holder and hideaway storage compartment to keep child's drinks and favorite things within arm's reach. This seat is Graco ProtectPlus Engineered to help protect your child in frontal, side, rear & rollover crashes. *To continue to meet industry standards, we have increased the weight minimum from 30 to 40 lb **Since the Latch system only secures the booster seat to the vehicle in this application and is not used for installation, it may be used regardless of the weight of the child (up to the maximum weight recommendation of the seat).
feature_bullets: Booster car seat helps safely transport your big kid from 40-100 lb* and up to 57" tall *To continue to meet industry standards, we have increased the weight minimum from 30 to 40 lb
One-hand front-adjust Latch system secures booster to vehicle seat
Secure connection keeps booster seat steady for easy self-buckling for your independent child
Full coverage back support even as your child grows
EPS, energy-absorbing foam for effective impact management

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars1,195 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
